channel.title: ~~~Monsters aren't attackable and server crash . . .~~~
channel.description:
I gave Verac 120hp in npc.cfg, but when I typed ::npc 2030 and summoned him, I cannot cast spell or range on him, and when I attack him by greataxe server crashed . . .
some1 help me pls?
and I just downloaded Moparscape, is all the spell's max hit and stuff like that added already?
need answers, thanks

item.title: ~~~Monsters aren't attackable and server crash . . .~~~
item.dc:creator: @dandy99 dandy99
item.description:
@dandy99 wrote:

dude just go into autospawn.cfg and autospawn verec then go npc.java and set his hpc different if it keeps crashing…

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~Monsters aren't attackable and server crash . . .~~~
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

i’ve always had problems summoning the kq. but verac is default in project 16 so never had a prob with him, if you gave him hp then i guess it should work… are you using hybridscape?

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~Monsters aren't attackable and server crash . . .~~~
item.dc:creator: @Overkill Overkill
item.description:
@Overkill wrote:

If your server says: Arithmatic error, then just re-install your server, and this time, don’t fuck up your source.
